About TJS2

　TJS2 is an object-oriented scripting language developed for embedding in applications. It also has the features of non-object-oriented languages and can be written in a way that is easy for the writer to describe.
　The grammar is similar to JavaScriptTM and JavaTM, so it's easy to learn.

About this manual

　It will explain TJS2 from the grammatical point of view.
　It also describes the classes and their methods provided in advance in TJS2.
